Key Match Events: Jos Buttler was dropped on eight and 40 but he clicked into gear and contributed 73 off 47 balls
Liam Livingstone flickered with 20 off 14 balls, clattering Tim Southee for six and ramping Lockie Ferguson for four
Harry Brook, Ben Stokes and Sam Curran were all promoted above Malan
Daryl Mitchell put down a far more straightforward chance when Buttler was on 40 off 30 balls
Jos Buttler was run out in the penultimate over, after a mix-up with Stokes
Miscellaneous Highlights: England need to win to realistically keep their semi-final hopes alive
New Zealand were underwhelming in the field after being asked to bowl first
Others: The match was part of the T20 World Cup
